    • Method Detail

      • flipAnimation

        public static void flipAnimation(int diskId,
                                 int color)
        Animates the transition of color.
        Parameters:
        diskId - Number from 1-64 identifying the circle whose color should be changed.
        color - Current color of this circle (1 = White, -1 = Black).

      • wrongPass

        public static void wrongPass()
        Alerts the user if he passes, even though he could make a move.

      • setList

        public static void setList(javafx.collections.ObservableList<javafx.scene.Node> children)
        Parameters:
        children - The list where all objects in the pane are stored. (Pane.getChildren())

      • handle

        public void handle(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event)
        Converts the ID given to the circles to their corresponding x,y position on the board and places a disk on the clicked circle, then refreshes the displayed board. If only one player is playing also tells the AI to calculate its move. After that refreshes the displayed board again.
        Specified by:
        handle in interface javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent>

      • refreshBoard

        public void refreshBoard()
        Synchronizes the graphical board shown in the application with the one which is used to make calculations.

      • nameDialog

        public static void nameDialog()
        Opens a dialog where the player(s) can enter their name(s).
